statements.select: SELECT * FROM AcOtherShouldCollection WHERE AcOtherShouldCollection.AcOtherShouldCollectionDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate#
SELECT * FROM AcOtherShouldCollection WHERE AcOtherShouldCollection.AcOtherShouldCollectionDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (CustomerId = #customer# OR #customer# IS NULL)

SELECT * FROM AcOtherShouldCollection WHERE AcOtherShouldCollection.AcOtherShouldCollectionDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (CustomerId = #customer# OR #customer# IS NULL) AND (#company# IS NULL OR CompanyId = #company#)
